channel.title: Appengine on ShopTrac's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Appengine on ShopTrac's Blog

item.title: Improving AppEngine performance: from JPA to Objectify
item.description: This weekend, I have migrated my Google AppEngine application Zoo Wizard from JPA to Objectify. This post gives a short overview of my rationale and the steps I’ve taken to complete this migration. Spoiler: moving to Objectify is a good move, and apart from some differences between @Embeddable in JPA and Objectify, the transition went smoothly. Rationale When I first created the application, I opted to use the GAE JPA API to stay in my comfort zone.
